sections.paragraph: + An Asherite, (1 Chronicles 7:32) also called Shamer. ver. (1 Chronicles 7:34) + The father (mother ?) of Jehozabad who slew King Joash. (2 Kings 12:21) In the parallel passage in (2 Chronicles 24:26) the name is converted into the feminine form Shimrith, who is further described as a Moabitess. [[1128]Shimrith] (B.C. 839.)
